doc.title: SVG Attribute reference

value.content: « SVG / SVG Element reference »

value.title: Animation event attributes
value.content: onbegin, onend, onload, onrepeat

value.title: Animation attribute target attributes
value.content: attributeType (en-US), attributeName (en-US)

value.title: Animation timing attributes
value.content: begin (en-US), dur (en-US), end (en-US), min (en-US), max (en-US), restart (en-US), repeatCount (en-US), repeatDur (en-US), fill

value.title: Animation value attributes
value.content: calcMode (en-US), values (en-US), keyTimes, keySplines (en-US), from (en-US), to (en-US), by (en-US), autoReverse, accelerate, decelerate

value.title: Animation addition attributes
value.content: additive (en-US), accumulate (en-US)

value.title: Conditional processing attributes
value.content: requiredExtensions, requiredFeatures (en-US), systemLanguage (en-US).

value.title: Core attributes
value.content: id (en-US), xml:base (en-US), xml:lang (en-US), xml:space (en-US)

value.title: Document event attributes
value.content: onabort, onerror, onresize, onscroll, onunload, onzoom

value.title: Filter primitive attributes
value.content: height (en-US), result (en-US), width, x (en-US), y (en-US)

value.title: Graphical event attributes
value.content: onactivate, onclick (en-US), onfocusin, onfocusout, onload, onmousedown, onmousemove, onmouseout, onmouseover, onmouseup

value.title: Presentation attributes
value.content:
Note that all SVG presentation attributes can be used as CSS properties.

alignment-baseline (en-US), baseline-shift (en-US), clip (en-US), clip-path (en-US), clip-rule (en-US), color (en-US), color-interpolation (en-US), color-interpolation-filters (en-US), color-profile (en-US), color-rendering, cursor (en-US), direction (en-US), display (en-US), dominant-baseline (en-US), enable-background (en-US), fill, fill-opacity (en-US), fill-rule (en-US), filter (en-US), flood-color (en-US), flood-opacity (en-US), font-family (en-US), font-size (en-US), font-size-adjust (en-US), font-stretch (en-US), font-style (en-US), font-variant (en-US), font-weight (en-US), glyph-orientation-horizontal (en-US), glyph-orientation-vertical (en-US), image-rendering (en-US), kerning (en-US), letter-spacing (en-US), lighting-color (en-US), marker-end (en-US), marker-mid (en-US), marker-start (en-US), mask (en-US), opacity (en-US), overflow (en-US), pointer-events (en-US), shape-rendering (en-US), stop-color (en-US), stop-opacity (en-US), stroke, stroke-dasharray (en-US), stroke-dashoffset, stroke-linecap (en-US), stroke-linejoin (en-US), stroke-miterlimit (en-US), stroke-opacity (en-US), stroke-width (en-US), text-anchor (en-US), text-decoration (en-US), text-rendering (en-US), unicode-bidi (en-US), visibility (en-US), word-spacing (en-US), writing-mode (en-US)

value.title: Transfer function attributes
value.content: type (en-US), tableValues (en-US), slope (en-US), intercept (en-US), amplitude (en-US), exponent (en-US), offset

value.title: XLink attributes
value.content: xlink:href (en-US), xlink:type (en-US), xlink:role, xlink:arcrole (en-US), xlink:title (en-US), xlink:show (en-US), xlink:actuate
